DOC.brief_summary: There will be performance abdominoplasty pos bariatric surgery in 32 patients. In 16 patients will keep the Scarpa´s Fascia, and other 16 will remove the Scarpa´s Fascia.
DOC.brief_title: Scarpa´s Fascia in the Formation of Seroma Pos Abdominoplasty After Bariatric Surgery
DOC.criteria: presence of the Scarpa´s Fascia BMI 28 to 32 Kg/m2 neoplasms Diabetes lymphatic system deseases abdominal scars except C section and bariatric surgery scars mental disorders lost followup
